          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Verb i presens</string>
            <string language="en">Verbs in present tense</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verben in der Gegenwart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verbes au présent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Verbos no tempo atual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Verbi nel presente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρήματα στον παρόντα χρόνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Verbos en el presente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränas några verb i sina presensformer.Modul 2 - Vad kostar det? - Grammatik 2.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">It trained some verbs in their present forms. Module 2 - What does it cost? - Grammar 2. Safir.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie bildete einige Verben in ihren anwesenden 
Formen aus. Modul 2 - Was kostet es? - Grammatik 2. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Il a formé quelques verbes sous leurs formes 
actuelles. Module 2 - Que coûte-t-il ? - grammaire 
2. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Treinou alguns verbos em seus formulários 
atuais. Módulo 2 - Que custa? - gramática 2. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ha addestrato alcuni verbi nelle loro forme 
attuali. Modulo 2 - Che cosa costa? - grammatica 2. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπαίδευσε μερικά ρήματα με παρούσες μορφές τους. 
Ενότητα 2 - τι κοστίζει; - Γραμματική 2. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entrenó a algunos verbos en sus actuales formas.
Módulo 2 - ¿Qué cuesta? - gramática 2. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
